events.name: Automotive industry transformation
events.wd_description: The automotive industry is undergoing one of the most dramatic transformations in its history, with manufacturers recognising their role in developing reliable supply chains, as well as logistics companies taking steps to optimise performance.
events.description: The automotive industry is undergoing one of the most dramatic transformations in its history, with manufacturers recognising their role in developing reliable supply chains, as well as logistics companies taking steps to optimise performance.

events.name: Manufacturers recognising role in developing reliable supply chains
events.wd_label: Manufacturers recognising role in developing reliable supply chains
events.wd_description: With manufacturers recognising their role in developing reliable supply chains, it seems that an evolved EV battery supply chain may soon become a reality.
events.description: With manufacturers recognising their role in developing reliable supply chains, it seems that an evolved EV battery supply chain may soon become a reality.

events.name: Logistics companies taking steps to optimise performance
events.wd_label: Logistics companies taking steps to optimise performance
events.wd_description: As well as logistics companies taking steps to optimise performance, it seems that an evolved EV battery supply chain may soon become a reality.
events.description: As well as logistics companies taking steps to optimise performance, it seems that an evolved EV battery supply chain may soon become a reality.

events.name: Investing in a global EV battery supply chain has the potential to completely transform how cars are produced and distributed on a worldwide scale
events.wd_label: Investing in a global EV battery supply chain has the potential to completely transform how cars are produced and distributed on a worldwide scale
events.wd_description: Ultimately, investing in a global EV battery supply chain has the potential to completely transform how cars are produced and distributed on a worldwide scale – providing better access to clean energy sources for both consumers and businesses alike.
events.description: Ultimately, investing in a global EV battery supply chain has the potential to completely transform how cars are produced and distributed on a worldwide scale – providing better access to clean energy sources for both consumers and businesses alike.
